outputs.output_descr:
1 A comprehensive human rights based and gender-appropriate HIV and AIDS legal and policy framework is developed and implemented, including an empowering and enabling legal framewrok, workplace policy guidance and promotion of effective local response programming to HIV at the district level
2 Increased number of public organizations at national and local level mainstreaming gender and human rights sensitive HIV and AIDS responses in their policies, plans, and sector strategies

3. Strengthened capacity of Government and civil society partners to implement, coordinate, monitor, and evaluate HIV and AIDS response at national and sub-national levels

project_descr: Capacity Development for the National Management of the HIV and AIDS Response
